main event: A silver object was observed moving vertically through clouds, stopping at 1000' before proceeding in horizontal flight.
interesting points: The sighting occurred twice, at 1145 CST and 1430 CST,The object covered 25 miles in 15 seconds,The observation lasted between 1 to 20 seconds, The object stopped and disappeared after traveling horizontally, The report concluded it might be an aircraft or aerolith.
